column2: this is really a paean to diner food - pancakes
column9: bread - all familiar stuff - but most items feature at least one unique twist.  For example
column10: the burgers include your choice of patty - beef of course
column11: but there is also goat and veggie.  The goat patty is really good - mildly gamey but well prepared - crispy caramelized on the outside but the inside was a bit dry.
